title: Announcing Directus AI: Elevate Your Data Projects with AI-Powered Extensions
outline:
### Introduction
- Brief introduction to Directus and its developer-centric philosophy.
- Mention of the AI trend and how Directus plans to integrate AI meaningfully.

### The Genesis of Directus AI
- Insights from Rijk's keynote speech on the motivation and approach to AI integration.
- Emphasis on user-driven development and cautious optimism regarding AI.

### Overview of New AI Extensions
- Detailed breakdown of the 10 new AI operation extensions (transcription, translation, alt text, text extraction, etc.)
- Highlight practical use cases and benefits for each extension.

### Integration and Accessibility
- Explain how developers can integrate these extensions into their existing workflows.
- Introduction to the Directus marketplace where these extensions can be downloaded.

### Conclusion
- Recap of key points and forward-looking statements about the evolution of AI at Directus.
- Invite developers to explore the new AI extensions and share feedback.

### Call to Action
- Direct link to the Directus marketplace.
- Announcement of the upcoming Directus TV series for detailed tutorials.

title: Top 5 Ways to Supercharge Your Directus Workflow with AI
outline:
### Introduction
- Explanation of Directus' commitment to enhancing developer workflows.
- Introduction to Directus AI and its key features.

### 1. AI Transcription Operation
- Use case: Converting media files into text with Deepgram speech recognition.
- How to set it up and its benefits.

### 2. AI Translation Operation
- Use case: Translating text into multiple languages effortlessly.
- Setup guide and advantages.

### 3. AI Text Intelligence Operation
- Use case: Analyzing text for summaries, sentiment, intents, and topics.
- Detailed setup and potential applications.

### 4. AI Image Generation Operation
- Use case: Creating images from text prompts for creative projects.
- Instructions and utility.

### 5. AI Image Moderation Operation
- Use case: Ensuring safe and positive application environments by detecting inappropriate content.
- Step-by-step setup and importance.

### Conclusion
- Recap of how these AI extensions can transform Directus workflows.
- Encouragement to explore the Directus marketplace for more AI tools.

### Call to Action
- Direct link to the Directus marketplace to download AI operation extensions.
